title: 02/16/2021 - HOUR 2 - Quarterback Dominoes, Mark Schlereth, LBJ's Second Love
itunes:title: 02/16/2021 - HOUR 2 - Quarterback Dominoes, Mark Schlereth, LBJ's Second Love
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin plays a round of "Quarterback Dominoes" in the NFL. FOX Sports NFL analyst and FS1 contributor Mark Schlereth joins The Herd to react to Colin's quarterback predictions. Plus, Colin discusses Los Angeles Lakers star LeBron James' second sports love and how much he would have dominated that sport in another life. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
